resources.string: Select one of the following options:
Enabling GPS satellite communication is recommended for this application. Would you like to enable GPS?

You have pressed the power button on your device while data was recording. To our dismay, this causes sensors such as the accelerometer to stop collecting data. Therefore, we have stopped the data collection process for you and will allow you to upload your data up to the point before the power button was pressed.

Enter a data set description (or leave blank if you\'d like an automatically generated description) and press \"Save\" to save your data set. Otherwise, you may throw away your recently recorded data set by pressing \"Delete\".
What would you like to do with this data set?
Enter a new name for your data set:

You have Internet connectivity, but you have not logged into our application yet. Logging in now will enable you to upload your data. However, you can still view your data sets without logging in. Would you like login now?

You need Internet connectivity in order to login and upload data. Since we cannot find any of your login credentials and there is no Internet connectivity, you cannot upload data sets yet. However, you may still view your data sets.
Step 2: Record a Data Set (Hold Down)
Remember my Sample Interval and Test Length
Welcome to the iSENSE Uploader. Select an option below.
Continue With an Existing iSENSE Project\n(requires Internet)
What would you like to do?
Collect Data Using My Device\'s Hardware Sensors
Upload a .csv File From My Device\n(requires project and Internet)
Select a field type from the drop down menu below to add a new field to your project.
